info.label: Information
info.text: CLick to view additional information about the screen and its text.

navigation.label: Navigation
navigation.text: The arrows on each sides of the screen move you either forward (right) or backward (left) in the exhibition.

chapters.label: Chapters
chapters.text: Click to view a list of all chapters and screens of the exhibition. Navigate to individual screens by clicking them.

audio.label: Audio
audio.text: This button allows you to control audio settings.

play.label: Playback
play.text: Pause the exhibition by either clicking this button or by pressing the space bar. Resume the exhibition by the same button or by pressing enter.

progressbar.label: Rewind
progressbar.text: Some types of screens (such as video or photo gallery ones) have a special bar to help you fast forward in the current screen.

dragThumb.label: Drag thumb
dragThumb.text: Drag to reveal the background image.
